metadata.lrc-note: (4/8/2002). The amendment made to this statute in 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 254, sec.1 which created subsection (31) of this statute, "applies to sales made on or after July 1, 2002." 2002 Ky. Acts ch.254, sec.3. (7/15/98). This section was amended by 1998 Ky. Acts chs. 29, 35, 125, 264, 265, 366, and 536. Where these Acts are not in conflict, they have been codified together. Where a conflict exists between chs. 29 and 35 and ch. 536, Acts ch. 536, which was last enacted by the General Assembly, prevails under KRS 446.250.
